Hanbo Shim

Computer Science and Business Technology Management
Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)

About Me

I am Hanbo Shim, a junior at KAIST, majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Business Technology Management. My primary interests lie in AI, quantum computing, and startups. After graduation, I plan to pursue a Ph.D. in AI or quantum computing.

Experience

Superconducting Quantum Nanoelectronics Laboratory

Research Intern - June 2024 - August 2024

Assisted research in adaptive quantum state tomography

  • Paper review and presentation of "Adaptive Quantum State Tomography Improves Accuracy Quadratically"
    (PRL 111, 183601 (2013))
  • Paper review and presentation of "Adaptive Quantum Tomography in High Dimensions"
    (PHYSICAL REVIEW A 98, 012339 (2018))
  • Created a simulation and an optimizer for adaptive quantum state tomography research
NumPy SciPy SymPy MatPlotLib Numerical Optimization Mathematica

AI x Precision Medicine Sprint 1st place

Competition Winner - March 2025

Proposed a novel AI pipeline to predict target tissues, evaluated by CEOs of leading drug discovery companies.

  • Competed against 9 teams. 1-hour ideation sprint evaluated by Professors and CEOs of drug discovery companies in Switzerland. Proposed a novel AI pipeline combining a Random Forest Classifier to predict target tissues from symptom locations and a fine-tuned LLM to enhance interpretability, earning top recognition for innovation and presentation.
Random Forest Classifier LLM Fine-tuning Pitching Collaboration

EPFL AI Team Engineer

Developer - March 2025 - July 2025

Participation in MMOODY Project, the project builds upon an existing emotion detector and uses these emotions as input for a recommender system to generate personalized film or music suggestions.

Full Stack Web Development Deep Learning

Projects

Some of the source codes cannot be publically disclosed due to academic integrity policies and research security. Please reach out to me for more information.

Adaptive Quantum State Tomography

SIFT Implementation

BoVW Image Classification Implementation

MNIST Number classification

CatBoost + XGBoost Ensemble Model

Stereo Matching Depth Estimation Implementation

Education / Training

Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)

Bachelor Program - September 2022 - Current

Bachelor Program in Computer Science and Business Technology Management
  • AI Special Designated Major
  • Minor in Business Technology Management
  • Joined a startup seminar on business models, PSST-based planning, and pitching; founded 'FireVision,' an AI-powered wildfire detection startup.
  • President of KAIST Kumdo club (2024)

École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL)

Bachelor Program Exchange - January 2025 - July 2025

Exchange in Bachelor Program in Computer Science
  • Final winner of AI x Precision Medicine Sprint Competition hosted by SV industry, EPFL
